messages.subject: Saints and Catholics (Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] more than one kind of dove)
messages.msgSnippet: The feast of St. Cecilia is November 22: http://www.catholic.org/saints/saint.php?saint_id=34 Old Chris is off the calendar, but not suppressed:
messages.messageBody:
The feast of St. Cecilia is November 22:
http://www.catholic.org/saints/saint.php?saint_id=34

Old Chris is off the calendar, but not suppressed:
http://www.catholic.org/saints/saint.php?saint_id=36



----- Original Message -----
From: "Alan & Brenda Leonard" <abtleo@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 05, 2002 1:59 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] more than one kind of dove


| on 8/4/02 16:37, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
| Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
|
| > First Saint Christopher is not a
| > saint,
|
| Wait!!! What happened to him??? I like Christopher, and still
haven't
| forgiven the Catholics for "demoting" Ceceila!
|
| brenda
